title: Decision Entity Lifecycle Status
description: Lifecycle status summarizes the current status of the creation, approval, usage and archival actions for the entity that mixes in this schema. A lifecycle action was performed and the results are indicated with this type.

meta:enum.draft: The object of the lifecycle action is considered as not yet ready for approval.
meta:enum.approved: The object of the lifecycle action (approval process) is considered approved and ready to be used.
meta:enum.rejected: The object of the lifecycle action (approval process) is considered rejected and must be modified before it can be used.
meta:enum.in-use: The object of the lifecycle action is considered to be in use. Restrictions may apply how contributing entities can be altered.
meta:enum.completed: The object of the lifecycle action is considered be completed or finished. Restrictions on how contributing entities can be altered may no longer apply.
meta:enum.archived: The object of the lifecycle action is considered be archived. The subject may be excluded from listing of entities.
